admin_templates.template:
<xen:comment>
	TINYMCE BUTTONS FOR ALL BROWSERS EXCEPT IE7
	This css template is a copy from the public template
</xen:comment>

@font-face
{
	font-family:'tinymce';
	src:url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon.eot');
	src:	url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon.svg#icomoon') format('svg'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon.woff') format('woff'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}

@font-face
{
	font-family:'tinymce-small';
	src:url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon-small.eot');
	src:	url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon-small.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon-small.svg#icomoon') format('svg'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon-small.woff') format('woff'),
		url('styles/sedo/tinyquattro/fonts/icomoon-small.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight:normal;
	font-style:normal;
}

.mce-ico
{
	font-family: 'tinymce',Arial;
	font-style: normal;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 16px;
	vertical-align: text-top;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	display: inline-block;
	background: transparent center center;
	width: 16px;
	height: 16px;
	color: #333;
}

.mce-btn-small .mce-ico
{
	font-family: 'tinymce-small',Arial;
}

	Buttons - XenForo config
</xen:comment>

@font-face

	font-family:'xenforo-small';

phrases.phrase: Options for some Wysiwyg BbCodes provided with TinyQuattro
These options are made to modify/complete/fix some behaviours of XenForo
Once the maximum height is reached, an overflow will be applied.
This minimum height will be activated when the editor is focused.
Once activated, this option will display a popup asking the user if he really wants to leave the page whereas the editor is not empty.
Automatically restore draft when editor is empty

If you set this option on "Yes" then, when a TinyMCE draft has been saved and the editor is empty, this draft will be automatically restore inside the editor. Once the message is sent, the draft will be erased. If you set this options on "No", the user can still get the draft back inside the editor. He just needs to manually click on the icon.
Select here the interval to auto save your draft (unit: seconds)
Select here how long your draft will be kept in memory (unit: minutes)

If you activate this option a context menu will be displayed when you click on the right button of your mouse. This context menu has some options in it. It is very useful if you use the tinymce table (you will have to activate this function inside the bbcode options).
Activate the BbCode > HTML Converter Patch?

This option will activate some fixes when you toggle the BbCode editor to the RTE editor. This fix generates a virtual BbCode pollution to look like the Html tags format.

This patch is disabled by default. Reason: its code is quite "acrobatic". On the other side, I've been using this html converter patch for several months without any problems on several boards. If you see any problems after having activated it, just disable it.
Activate the HTML > BbCode Converter Patch?

This option will activate some fixes when you toggle the RTE editor to the BbCode editor

This patch is enable by default.
This will disable TinyMCE 4 on mobile devices and will load your forum default editor.
With TinyMCE the browser spellcheck is disabled by default. If you want to activate it, select yes.
This option will add a menu to the colors buttons (frontcolor/backcolor) to load a color picker.

The TinyMCE default list buttons have several options incompatible with the XenForo parser (it would need to be extendable to try to integrate them). This option must be set to "no" until XenForo becomes more open.

If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: bcolor.

These Bb Codes will be added to XenForo (only > 1.2) and will work with their TinyMCE Quattro functions, which means they will have a Wysiwyg output. They should work with the XenForo redactor too, but these functions and their buttons will have to be coded or activated (if someone wants this, feel free to do it, but I will not).
Note: if you want to set some cellpadding, you will need to check if your table doesn't have the css setting "border-collapse" set on "collapse" but on "separate". Default: 7.
Note: if you want to set some cellspacing, you will need to check if your table doesn't have the css setting "border-collapse" set on "collapse" but on "seperate". Default: 7.
This max height in percentage will be used if an user sets a bigger height. Default: 100.
This max height in pixels will be used if an user sets a bigger height. Default: 1000.
This max width in percentage will be used if an user sets a bigger width. Default: 100.
This max width in pixels will be used if an user sets a bigger width. Default: 800.
This min height in percent will be used if an user sets a smaller height. Default: 15.
This min height in pixels will be used if an user sets a smaller height. Default: 150.
This min width in percent will be used if an user sets a smaller width. Default: 15.
This min width in pixels will be used if an user sets a smaller width. Default: 50.

If you want to change the tag name for this bb code, do it here but do it only once. If you change the tag name a few time using it, all previous bb codes won't be able to be parsed. Default is: xtable.
This option will add a fast menu with an unlink option to the link button
The fright mode will make some buttons float on the right of the editor
If you see any problems with TinyMCE once loaded in an overlay, enable this option. This will modify the XenForo Overlay (provided by jQueryTools) configuration.
This will hide the html path inside the status bar.
Select here if the size of your buttons
Activate the BbCode > Wysiwyg HTML Parser Patch?

This option will activate some fixes when you edit a message with the RTE editor and when you toggle the Bb Code editor to the RTE editor.

The fixes are relative to the Pacman problem (eaten space between the end of a list and the next paragraph) & the tabulation problem (tabs are modified to 4 blanks characters).

This patch is enable by default.
Activate the RTE Editor on mobile devices?
This option will bypass the XenForo protection (all version below the 1.2) that prevents to load the Rich Text Editor (wysiwyg) on mobile devices.
Enable an user option for the RTE?
This will enable & activate an option to let users decide if they want to use or not the RTE editor on their personal mobile device.
Activate the Wysiwyg HTML > BbCode Parser Patch?

This option will activate a small but important patch that will convert 4 white spaces from the RTE editor to a real tabulation when you save your message.

Important: this patch will only save tabulations in posts and conversations. If you want to enable it globally you will have to:

- Edit the following class: XenForo_Html_Renderer_BbCode
- Find the function renderFromHtml
- Just before: return $rendered;
- Add: $rendered = preg_replace('# {4}#', "\t", $rendered);

This patch is enable by default.

Select this option if you want to activate by default the plain text mode when a user pastes a text inside the editor. He will be able to enable it again if you have inserted the plain text button inside the buttons bar.
Choose what kind of description should be displayed on mouse over.

The "smilies slider" will load a slider with your smilies. The biggest difference is of course the slider but also the loading method. The smilies modal will be loaded programmatically (TinyMCE feature) whereas the the smilies slider overlay will be loaded using the XenForo template system. The first method is faster.

In both methods, the width and the height of the modal window can be set in the style properties.
This option will display a status bar below the editor
This option will activate the TinyMCE word count plugin.
Select here the number of smilies you would like to display in the button menu. Set 0 if you want to display all of them.
[Slider Smilies] Number of smilies per slide?
Select the number of smilies to display per slide.

DO NOT CHANGE THIS UNLESS TO BE TOLD TO
Enter here the converters guilty tags. Each tags must be without square brackets ([]) and must be separated with a coma. Default values: left,center,right,b,i,u,s,font,color,size,bcolor,justify
You are no more connected. You should log again to avoid to lose your modifications.
Use the rich text editor with your mobile device?
If your mobile device is not compatible with the Rich Text Editor, just uncheck this option.
Insert a new link or email
Please use Ctrl+V/Cmd+V keyboard shortcuts to paste contents.
Paste is now in plain text mode. Contents will now be pasted as plain text until you toggle this option off.
This option will disable the background gradient effects. Don't forget, since the XenForo css are heavily cached, you will certainly have to clean your browser cache before to see the modifications.
The color will be used in many other properties
This color will be also use in different areas of the editor.
This color will be also use in different areas of the editor.
Type here the hexa color you choose above with the prefix "#ff". Example for the color "#fdfdfd", type: #fffdfdfd (#ff+fdfdfd). The ff prefix only means the color will be opaque.
This color will be also use in different areas of the editor.
This border is used in several elements.

property.title: Panel background color
property.description: This color will be also use in different areas of the editor.

property.title: Panel gradient from:
property.description: This color will be also use in different areas of the editor.

property.title: Panel gradient to:
property.description: This color will be also use in different areas of the editor.

property.title: [Old IE] Panel gradient from:
property.description: Type here the hexa color you choose above with the prefix "#ff". Example for the color "#fdfdfd", type: #fffdfdfd (#ff+fdfdfd). The ff prefix only means the color will be opaque.

property.title: Border standard
property.description: This border is used in several elements.

property.title: Border focus
property.description: The color will be used in many other properties

property.title: Flat design
property.description: This option will disable the background gradient effects. Don't forget, since the XenForo css are heavily cached, you will certainly have to clean your browser cache before to see the modifications.

templates.template: {xen:raw $tagContent}

The below css template is the default css. It must be included with all dialog The below css template is the template that will be only use to customize this dialog The below line is the locaction of the Javascript file that will manage the submit function and, if you want, the "onafterload" callback. It can be anywhere and have the name you want. But its content must have a single Javascript Object named xenMCE.Templates.Bbm_yourTemplate. You just need to replace yourTemplate with the name of your template (here: demo). Below starts the dialog html content. There are several commands that will automatically perform some tasks for your. Examples: #classes# > mceTitle => will give a title to the modal window > mceFocus => will focus the field > mceSubmit => will change the title of the submit button > mceCancel => will change the title of the cancel button > mce-xen-content => css to use for the content of the overlay > ... (check the other dialogs to see the options (tabs/inputs inline/normal inputs, etc.) #name# > Every input tags (input, textarea, select) will be automatically send to the submit function (check the event "data"). Don't forget to specify a name attribute to get the data. > If you need another field or tag content to be send, just add it this data parameter: data-input (data-input="whatYouWant"). Both the content of the data-input parameter and the content content of its tag will be send to the submit function #template variables# > $selection.text => selection in raw format > $selection.html => selection in html format > $selection.bbCode => selection in BbCode format > $isUrl => if the selection is an Url (link or email) > $isLink => if the selection is a link > $isEmail => if the selection is an Email > $urlDatas.text => the url text > $urlDatas.href => the url link

<xen:foreach loop="$customQuattroButtonsJs" value="$button" i="$i" count="$total"> <xen:set var="$coma">{xen:if '{$i} != {$total}', ','}</xen:set>
<xen:if is="{$button.return} == 'direct'"> {$button.tag}:{ code: "{$button.code}", iconSet: "{$button.iconSet}", desc: "{xen:jsescape {$button.description}}", type: "{$button.type}", typeOpt: "{xen:jsescape {$button.typeOption}}", _return: "{$button.return}", tagOpt: "{xen:jsescape {$button.tagOptions}}", tagCont: "{xen:jsescape {$button.tagContent}}", separator: "{xen:jsescape {$button.separator}}" }{$coma} <xen:else /> {$button.tag}:{ code: "{$button.code}", iconSet: "{$button.iconSet}", desc: "{xen:jsescape {$button.description}}", type: "{$button.type}", typeOpt: "{xen:jsescape {$button.typeOption}}", _return: "{$button.return}", template: "{$button.returnOption}", separator: "{xen:jsescape {$button.separator}}" }{$coma} </xen:if> </xen:foreach>

<xen:comment>
	ALL EDITOR CSS (EXCEPT IFRAME CONTENT)
	> IE7 have the same CSS except for buttons.
	> These main css can be copied to the tiny_quattro_editor_ie7.css, just change the require template (see the last line)
	> Why this?  
		1) conditionals don't work here
		2) buttons css must be included in the main css (using another css template with <xen:require> will create problems (can be solved with !important, but let's avoid this)
		3) modifications should be easier to make like this
</xen:comment>

<xen:comment>
	 GLOBAL CSS
</xen:comment>

.mce-container,.mce-container *,.mce-widget,.mce-widget *
{
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	border: 0;
	outline: 0;
	vertical-align: top;
	background: transparent;
	text-decoration: none;
	color: #000;
	font-family: "Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;
	font-size: 14px;
	text-shadow: none;
	float: none;
	position: static;
	width: auto;
	height: auto;
	white-space: nowrap;
	cursor: inherit;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
	line-height:normal;
	font-weight:normal;
	text-align:left;
	-moz-box-sizing:content-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;
	box-sizing:content-box
}

.mce-widget button {
	-moz-box-sizing:border-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;
	box-sizing:border-box
}

.mce-container *[unselectable]
{
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-o-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
}

.mce-container ::-webkit-scrollbar
{
	width: 8px;
	height: 8px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}

.mce-container ::-webkit-scrollbar-track,.mce-container ::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece
{
	background-color: transparent;
}

.mce-container ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
{
	background-color: rgba(53,57,71,0.3);
	width: 6px;
	height: 6px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}

.mce-fade
{
	opacity: 0;
	-webkit-transition: opacity .15s linear;
	transition: opacity .15s linear;
}

.mce-fade.mce-in
{
	opacity: 1;
}

.mce-tinymce
{
	visibility: visible!important;
	position: relative;
}

.mce-fullscreen
{
	border: 0;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
	overflow: hidden !important;
	background: #FFF;
	height: 100%;
	z-index: 10000;
}

div.mce-fullscreen
{
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: auto;
}

.mce-tinymce
{
	display: block;
	border-radius: 2px;
}

.mce-wordcount
{
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	right:0;
	padding: 8px 20px 8px 8px;
}

.mce-edit-area
{
	background: #FFF;
	filter: none;
	margin-right:1px; <xen:comment>Fix for Chrome with QuickReply</xen:comment>
}

.mce-statusbar
{
	position: relative;
}

.mce-statusbar .mce-container-body
{
	position: relative;
}

.mce-fullscreen .mce-resizehandle
{
	display: none;
}

.mce-charmap
{
	border-collapse: collapse;
}

.mce-charmap td
{
	{xen:property tinyquattro_standard_boder}
	width: 20px;
	height: 20px;
	line-height: 20px;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 2px;
	cursor: default;
}

.mce-charmap td:hover
{
	background: {xen:property tinyquattro_btn_gradient_to};
}

.mce-grid td div {
	border:1px solid #808080;
	width:12px;
	height:12px;
	margin:2px;
	cursor:pointer
}
.mce-grid td div:hover {
	border-color:black
}
.mce-grid td div:focus {
	border-color:#59a5e1;
	outline:1px solid rgba(82,168,236,0.8);
	border-color:rgba(82,168,236,0.8)
}

.mce-grid
{
	border-spacing: 2px;
	border-collapse: separate;
}

.mce-grid a
{
	display: block;
	border: 1px solid transparent;
}

.mce-grid a:hover
{
	border-color:{xen:property tinyquattro_standard_boder.border-color};
}

.mce-grid-border
{
	margin: 0 4px 0 4px;
}

.mce-grid-border a
{
	border-color: #e8e8e8;
	width: 13px;
	height: 13px;
}

.mce-grid-border a:hover,.mce-grid-border a.mce-active
{
	border-color: #c4daff;
	background: #deeafa;
}

.mce-text-center
{
	text-align: center;
}

div.mce-tinymce-inline
{
	width: 100%;
	-webkit-box-shadow: none;
	-moz-box-shadow: none;
	box-shadow: none;
}

.mce-container,.mce-container-body
{
	display: block;
}

.mce-autoscroll
{
	overflow: hidden;
}

.mce-scrollbar
{
	position: absolute;
	width: 7px;
	height: 100%;
	top: 2px;
	right: 2px;
	opacity: .4;
	filter: alpha(opacity=40);
	zoom: 1;
}

.mce-scrollbar-h
{
	top: auto;
	right: auto;
	left: 2px;
	bottom: 2px;
	width: 100%;
	height: 7px;
}

.mce-scrollbar-thumb
{
	position: absolute;
	background-color: #000;
	border: 1px solid #888;
	border-color: rgba(85,85,85,0.6);
	width: 5px;
	height: 100%;
	-webkit-border-radius: 7px;
	-moz-border-radius: 7px;
	border-radius: 7px;
}

.mce-scrollbar-h .mce-scrollbar-thumb
{
	width: 100%;
	height: 5px;
}

.mce-scrollbar:hover,.mce-scrollbar.mce-active
{
	background-color: #AAA;
	opacity: .6;
	filter: alpha(opacity=60);
	zoom: 1;
	-webkit-border-radius: 7px;
	-moz-border-radius: 7px;
	border-radius: 7px;
}

.mce-scroll
{
	position: relative;
}

.mce-panel
{
	{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_border}
	background-color: {xen:property tinyquattro_panel_background_color};
	<xen:if is="!{xen:property 'tinyquattro_flatdesign'}">
		background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top,{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_from},{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_to});
		background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear,0 0,0 100%,from({xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_from}),to({xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_to}));
		background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_from},{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_to});
		background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top,{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_from},{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_to});
		background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom,{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_from},{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_to});
		background-repeat: repeat-x;
		filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_from_ie}',endColorstr='{xen:property tinyquattro_panel_gradient_to_ie}',GradientType=0);
		zoom: 1;
	</xen:if>
}

.mce-floatpanel
{
	position: absolute;
	-webkit-box-shadow: #ccc 5px 5px 5px;
	-moz-box-shadow: #ccc 5px 5px 5px;
	box-shadow: #ccc 5px 5px 5px;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-fixed {
	position:fixed
}

.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow,.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow:after
{
	position: absolute;
	display: block;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	border-color: transparent;
	border-style: solid;
}

.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow
{
	border-width: 11px;
}

.mce-floatpanel .mce-arrow:after
{
	border-width: 10px;
	content: "";
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover
{
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	background: #fff;
	-webkit-background-clip: padding-box;
	-moz-background-clip: padding;
	background-clip: padding-box;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	-webkit-border-radius: 6px;
	-moz-border-radius: 6px;
	border-radius: 6px;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	-moz-box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom
{
	margin-top: 10px;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom>.mce-arrow
{
	left: 50%;
	margin-left: -11px;
	border-top-width: 0;
	border-bottom-color: #999;
	border-bottom-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
	top: -11px;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom>.mce-arrow:after
{
	top: 1px;
	margin-left: -10px;
	border-top-width: 0;
	border-bottom-color: #fff;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-start
{
	margin-left: -22px;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-start>.mce-arrow
{
	left: 20px;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-end
{
	margin-left: 22px;
}

.mce-floatpanel.mce-popover.mce-bottom.mce-end>.mce-arrow
{
	right: 10px;
	left: auto;
}

.mce-fullscreen
{
	border: 0;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
	overflow: hidden;
	background: #FFF;
	height: 100%;
}

div.mce-fullscreen
{
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
}

#mce-modal-block
{
	opacity: 0;
	filter: alpha(opacity=0);
	zoom: 1;
	position: fixed;
	left: 0;
	top: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	background: #000;
}

#mce-modal-block.mce-in
{
	opacity: .3;
	filter: alpha(opacity=30);
	zoom: 1;
}

.mce-window-move
{
	cursor: move;
}

.mce-window
{
	{xen:property tinyquattro_win}
}

.mce-window.mce-in
{
	opacity: 1;
}

.mce-window-head
{
	{xen:property tinyquattro_win_head}
}

.mce-window-head .mce-close

	ALL EDITOR CSS (EXCEPT IFRAME CONTENT)
	> IE7 have the same CSS except for buttons.

.mce-container,.mce-container *,.mce-widget,.mce-widget *
{
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	border: 0;
	outline: 0;
	vertical-align: top;
	background: transparent;
	text-decoration: none;
	color: #000;
	font-family: "Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;
	font-size: 14px;
	text-shadow: none;
	float: none;
	position: static;
	width: auto;
	height: auto;
	white-space: nowrap;
	cursor: inherit;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
	line-height:normal;
	font-weight:normal;
	text-align:left;
	-moz-box-sizing:content-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;
	box-sizing:content-box
}

.mce-widget button {
	-moz-box-sizing:border-box;
	-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;
	box-sizing:border-box
}

{
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-o-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
}

.mce-container ::-webkit-scrollbar
{
	width: 8px;
	height: 8px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}

{

}

.mce-xen-font-family-menu .mce-container-body{
	width:180px;
	height:80px;
	overflow-y:auto;
}

<xen:comment>
	/*Normal Icons can still work*/
	.mce-ico.mce-i-xen_switch {
		background: url('{xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/xenforo-ui-sprite.png') no-repeat scroll -144px 0 ;
	}
</xen:comment>

<xen:comment>
	XenForo Smilies
</xen:comment>

<xen:include template="tiny_quattro_smilies.css" />

.mceQuattroSmilieBlock{
	width: {xen:property tinyquattro_smiliesbtn_width};
	white-space: normal;
	text-align: center;
	padding:5px;
	height: {xen:property tinyquattro_smiliesbtn_height};
	overflow:auto;
}

.mceQuattroSmilieBlockFull{
	width: {xen:property tinyquattro_smiliespicker_width};
	height: {xen:property tinyquattro_smiliespicker_height};
	white-space: normal;
	overflow:auto;
}

.mceQuattroSmilieBlock a,
.mceQuattroSmilieBlockFull a{
	white-space: normal;
}

.mceQuattroSmilieBlock > img,
.mceQuattroSmilieBlockFull > img,
.mceQuattroSmilie{
	margin:2px;
	cursor: pointer;
}

<xen:comment>
	BUTTONS: DON'T MOVE THIS INCLUDE.
	It must be at the last line
</xen:comment>

<xen:include template="tiny_quattro_buttons_ie7.css" />

<xen:if is="{$quattroGrid}"> <xen:foreach loop="$quattroGrid" value="$buttons" key="$key"> toolbar{$key}: "{$buttons}", </xen:foreach> <xen:else /> <xen:comment>Default Fallback</xen:comment> toolbar1: "removeformat undo redo pastetext restoredraft | xen_fontfamily xen_fontsize forecolor backcolor | bold italic underline strikethrough | alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify | fullscreen xen_switch", toolbar2: "bullist numlist outdent indent | xen_image xen_media xen_link xen_unlink | xen_smilies xen_smilies_picker charmap xen_nonbreaking xen_code xen_quote", </xen:if>

<xen:comment>
	EDITOR IFRAME CONTENT CSS
</xen:comment>

body.mce-content-body {
	{xen:property html.background}
	
	{xen:property html.font}
	
	{xen:property body.background}

	{xen:property body.font}
	
	{xen:property content.background}

	{xen:property content.font}

	{xen:property primaryContent.background}

	{xen:property primaryContent.font}
	
	{xen:property messageInfo.background}

	{xen:property messageInfo.font}

	{xen:property messageText}
	
	background-image: none;
	
	{xen:property editorContent}
	
	scrollbar-3dlight-color: #f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-arrow-color: #676662;
	scrollbar-base-color: #f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-darkshadow-color: #ddd;
	scrollbar-face-color: #e0e0dd;
	scrollbar-highlight-color: #f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-shadow-color: #f0f0ee;
	scrollbar-track-color: #f5f5f5;
}

body, td, pre
{	
	margin:8px;
	word-wrap: break-word;
}

p { margin: 0; padding: 0; }

td,th {
    font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
    font-size: 11px;
}

.mce-object {
    border: 1px dotted #3a3a3a;
    background: #d5d5d5 url(styles/sedo/tinyquattro/img/object.gif) no-repeat center;
}

.mce-pagebreak {
    cursor: default;
    display: block;
    border: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 5px;
    border: 1px dashed #666;
    margin-top: 15px;
}

.mce-item-anchor {
    cursor: default;
    display: inline-block;
    -webkit-user-select: all;
    -webkit-user-modify: read-only;
    -moz-user-select: all;
    -moz-user-modify: read-only;
    width: 9px!important;
    height: 9px!important;
    border: 1px dotted #3a3a3a;
    background: #d5d5d5 url(styles/sedo/tinyquattro/img/anchor.gif) no-repeat center;
}

.mce-nbsp {
    background: #AAA;
}

hr {
    cursor: default;
}

.mce-match-marker {
    background: green;
    color: #fff;
}

.mce-spellchecker-word {
    background: url(styles/sedo/tinyquattro/img/wline.gif) repeat-x bottom left;
    cursor: default;
}

.mce-item-table,.mce-item-table td,.mce-item-table th,.mce-item-table caption {
    border: 1px dashed #BBB;
}

td.mce-item-selected,th.mce-item-selected {
    background-color: #39f!important;
}

.mce-edit-focus {
    outline: 1px dotted #333;
}

a:link,
a:visited
{
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property link}}
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property ugcLink}}
}

h1 { font-size: 2em; }
h2 { font-size: 1.5em; }
h3 { font-size: 1.17em; }
h4 { font-size: 1em; }
h5 { font-size: .83em; }
h6 { font-size: .75em; }


<xen:include template="bb_code_base.css" />
<xen:include template="bb_code.css" />
<xen:if is="{$smilieSprites}">
	<xen:foreach loop="{$smilieSprites}" key="{$smilieId}" value="{$smilieSprite}">
		<xen:if is="{$smilieSprite.sprite_css}">
			img.mceQuattroSmilieSprite.mceSmilie{$smilieId}{
				{xen:raw $smilieSprite.sprite_css}
			}
		</xen:if>
	</xen:foreach>
</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
	Load Quattro Integration JS files for 1.2
</xen:comment>

	<xen:if is="{$quattroIntegration}">
		<xen:require js="js/sedo/tinyquattro/integration/retro_quickreply.js" />
	</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
	Load MCE4 main JS
</xen:comment>

	<xen:require js="js/sedo/tinyquattro/tinymce/tinymce.min.js" />

<xen:comment>
	Load Custom Buttons CSS
</xen:comment>
	<xen:if is="{$visitor.getBrowser.IEis} != 7">
		<xen:require css="tiny_quattro_editor.css" />
		<style type="text/css">
			<xen:foreach loop="$customQuattroButtonsCss" value="$button">
				.mce-i-{$button.buttonCode}:before	{ content: "\{$button.iconCode}"; }
			</xen:foreach>
		</style>
	<xen:else />
		<xen:require css="tiny_quattro_editor_ie7.css" />
		<style type="text/css">
			<xen:foreach loop="$customQuattroButtonsCss" value="$button">
				.mce-i-{$button.buttonCode}	{ -ie7-icon: "\{$button.iconCode}"; }
			</xen:foreach>
		</style>
	</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
	MCE Configuration
</xen:comment>

<script>
<xen:hook name="quattro_js_setup" params="{xen:array 'editorId={$editorId}'}">

!function($, window, document, _undefined)
{

	if(typeof xenMCE === 'undefined') xenMCE = {};

	<xen:hook name="quattro_phrases" params="{xen:array 'editorId={$editorId}'}">
		xenMCE.Phrases = {<xen:include template="tiny_quattro_phrases" />}
	</xen:hook>

	<xen:hook name="quattro_params" params="{xen:array 'editorId={$editorId}'}">
		xenMCE.Params = {<xen:include template="tiny_quattro_params" />}
	</xen:hook>

	var $editor = $("#{xen:jsescape $editorId}_html").hide();
	console.info('XenForo editor %s, %o', '{xen:jsescape {$editorId}}', $editor);
		
	$(function()
	{
		$editor.css('visibility', '').show();
		
		if (window.tinyMCE)
		{
			config = {
				selector: "#"+$editor.attr('id'),
				theme: "modern",
				language: "xen",
				skin: false,
				content_css: "css.php?style={xen:urlencode $visitorStyle.style_id}&css=tiny_quattro_iframe&d={xen:urlencode $visitorStyle.last_modified_date}",
				menubar: false,
				toolbar_items_size: '{$xenOptions.quattro_iconsize}',
				plugins: [
				 "advlist autolink lists charmap visualchars fullscreen {xen:if "{$xenOptions.quattro_contextmenu}", "contextmenu"}",
				 "directionality searchreplace {xen:if "{$xenOptions.quattro_extra_bbcodes.xtable}", "table"}", 
				 "paste textcolor autoresize autosave xenforo"
				],
				resize: false,
				//object_resizing: false,
				browser_spellcheck: {$xenOptions.quattro_enable_browser_spellcheck},
				autoresize_min_height: {$xenOptions.quattro_autoresize_min_height},
				autoresize_max_height: {$xenOptions.quattro_autoresize_max_height},
				autosave_interval: '{$xenOptions.quattro_autosave_interval}s',
				autosave_retention: '{$xenOptions.quattro_autosave_retention}m',
				autosave_restore_when_empty: {$xenOptions.quattro_autosave_autorestore},
				directionality: '{$visitorLanguage.text_direction}',<xen:comment>Must be set by a BM</xen:comment>
				document_base_url: "{xen:jsescape $requestPaths.fullBasePath}",	
				autosave_ask_before_unload: {$xenOptions.quattro_autosave_ask_before_unload},
				paste_as_text: {$xenOptions.quattro_paste_as_text},
				font_size_legacy_values: "9px,10px,12px,15px,18px,22px,26px",
				statusbar: {$xenOptions.quattro_statusbar},
				contextmenu: "xen_link inserttable | cell row column deletetable",
				xen_attach: "{$editorOptions.sedo_quattro.attach.type},{$editorOptions.sedo_quattro.attach.id},{$editorOptions.sedo_quattro.attach.hash}",
				<xen:include template="tiny_quattro_grid" />
				nonbreaking_force_tab: true
			};

			<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.quattro_wordcount} != 'no'">
				config.plugins.push('wordcount');

				<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.quattro_wordcount} == 'char'">
					config.wordcount_countregex = /\S/g;
					config.wordcount_cleanregex = '';
				</xen:if>

				<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.quattro_wordcount} == 'charwp'">
					config.wordcount_countregex = /(\S|\b[\u0020]\b)/g;
					config.wordcount_cleanregex = /\n/g;
				</xen:if>
			</xen:if>
			
			tinymce.init(config);
			xenMCE.defaultConfig = config;
		}
		else
		{
			<xen:if is="!{$message}">$editor.after($('<input type="hidden" name="_xfRteFailed" value="1" />'));</xen:if>
		}

		$editor.data('editorActivated', true);
		$editor.addClass('mceQuattro');
	});
}
(jQuery, this, document);

</xen:hook>

</script>
